archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Marketing Automation/Campaign Management
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Assuming Campaign Management is part of the scope, so no external module will be integrated.
09/10: Marcus - CCM do standard marketing/campaign actions, i.e. sms, email, DM, push notification. Missing - In App messaging, Web Push, NBA/NBO, tracking customer journeys, ML/AI (Brace)
